33. Functions and Macros


Up: Language Binding Next: Processes Previous: C Binding Issues

An implementation is allowed to implement MPI_WTIME, PMPI_WTIME, MPI_WTICK, PMPI_WTICK, MPI_AINT_ADD, PMPI_AINT_ADD, MPI_AINT_DIFF, PMPI_AINT_DIFF, and the handle-conversion functions ( MPI_Group_f2c, etc.) in Section Transfer of Handles , and no others, as macros in C.


Advice to implementors.

Implementors should document which routines are implemented as macros. ( End of advice to implementors.)

Advice to users.

If these routines are implemented as macros, they will not work with the MPI profiling interface. ( End of advice to users.)
